promo-mobile-steps.title: YOUR PRODUCTS FAST AND EASY
promo-mobile-steps.contact-description: Call us, write us via email or whatsapp and we will assist you during the process.
promo-mobile-steps.quote-description: Convey your measurements or schedule an appointment to measure and quote your measurements.
promo-mobile-steps.manufacturing-description: In case of approving the budget, we will manufacture your product between 5 to 7 work days.
promo-mobile-steps.install-description: We will install your products pending in every detail, in perfect order and cleanliness.

promo-email-form.title: REQUEST A PROFESIONAL MEASUREMENT
promo-email-form.description: If you do not have your measures, fill this form and we will call your to schedule an appointment to take your measures. Measurements outside of Santo Domingo? No issue, it will only take an additional fee
promo-email-form.reference: Reference - In front of the park, etc...
